passage_text: 1. Mona Lisa – Leonardo da Vinci. The most famous art work and painting in the world is the main attraction of the Louvre museum in Paris, where it is seen by six million people every year! Leonardo da Vinci painted it from the year 1503 or 1504 till shortly before he died in 1519. Most Famous Works Of Art: Mona Lisa, Louvre, Paris. 2.
History of Mona Lisa. Mona Lisa by Leonardo da Vinci (La Joconde in French) is the most famous painting of the Louvre. Leonardo da Vinci was born in 1452 in Vinci near Florence in Italy.

The Mona Lisa. Leonardo da Vinci's mysterious portrait of the Mona Lisa, with her enigmatic smile and unknown identity, is the most famous painting in the Louvre. It sits on the first floor, among the 13th to 15th century Italian painting collection. Expect to be part of a large crowd when you view it.

The most famous painting in the world is the main attraction of the Louvre museum in Paris, where it is seen by six million people every year! Leonardo da Vinci painted it from the year 1503 or 1504 till shortly before he died in 1519. Most Famous Paintings: Mona Lisa, by Leonardo da Vinci. 2.
